comment:
* A TransformerHandler
 * listens for SAX ContentHandler parse events and transforms
 * them to a Result.

methods.name: public void setResult(Result result) throws IllegalArgumentException
methods.comment:
*

Set the Result associated with this * TransformerHandler to be used for the transformation.

* * @param result A Result instance, should not be * null. * * @throws IllegalArgumentException if result is invalid for some reason.

methods.name: public void setSystemId(String systemID)
methods.comment:
* Set the base ID (URI or system ID) from where relative
     * URLs will be resolved.
     * @param systemID Base URI for the source tree.

methods.name: public String getSystemId()
methods.comment:
* Get the base ID (URI or system ID) from where relative
     * URLs will be resolved.
     * @return The systemID that was set with {@link #setSystemId}.

methods.name: public Transformer getTransformer()
methods.comment:
*

Get the Transformer associated with this handler, which * is needed in order to set parameters and output properties.

* * @return Transformer associated with this * TransformerHandler.

methodNames: public void setResult(Result result) throws IllegalArgumentException
